amendment.description: An amendment numbered 120 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit funds to the World Health Organization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
